text: San Francisco, CA / Bay Area http://leagueapps.com Our platform powering recreational sports leagues & events needs to evolve to keep up with the demand. We're seeking an experienced software engineer well versed in Java, Javascript, and SQL (Scala & Python relevant as well). You will own large chunks of the system and work with a small team faced with many interesting challenges. Send your resume and a brief note to bob@leagueapps.com
